Headline: Temporary Southbound Reroute near Woodlawn/55th
ShortDescription: Southbound 172 buses are temporarily rerouted via Hyde Park, Woodlawn, 55th, Ellis and resume their regular route due to construction.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #172 buses are temporarily rerouted via Hyde Park, Woodlawn, 55th, Ellis and resume their regular route due to construction.

Northbound #172 buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Jackson
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing in both directions due to police activity at Jackson. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing in both directions due to police activity at Jackson.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
